title: Anivia's New Ultimate. To Shake things up.
body:
I was thinking of changing Anivia's Ultimate from Glacial Storm to Blizzard.
Blizzard is where Anivia Changes the environment in order to benefit other Ice Champions on either team and much much more. Look at my below comment to see the google doc. it looks weird in the body message.

replies.body:
Here's the link to the google doc sorry. it looks better on Microsoft word but bare with me.
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1SC28mSF1zeeSHJNH_3-hDgS0xzqkEs2fXTm6nBYGawM/edit?usp=sharing

That type of link only works on your computer because it is a local link for your computer...
Only you can see it.

How do I delocalize it?
Here's the google doc version
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1SC28mSF1zeeSHJNH_3-hDgS0xzqkEs2fXTm6nBYGawM/edit?usp=sharing

Heres the file. its in PDF 
file:///C:/Users/chris/Documents/Anivia's%20New%20Ult.pdf
